Method Detail

getTerm

public edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.Term getTerm(java.lang.String termQuery)
Get a complete Term object from MeSH. If the database already contains the top match, then it will be the source for the Term. In the case that multiple entities have the same name, all of their relationships will be put into the same 'composite' Term object. Caution: may not return exact match to query. Search is based on MeSH native search, try it here: http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/

Specified by:
getTerm in interface edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.resource_dao.ResourceDataAccessObject
Parameters:
termQuery - String to query for
Returns:
Term object that was the top result from MeSH, or composite from db

getTerm

public edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.Term getTerm(java.lang.String termQuery,
                                                          boolean exact)
Similar to getTerm(String), but with option to enforce exact matching to the termQuery String. Returns null when there is no exact match.

Specified by:
getTerm in interface edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.resource_dao.ResourceDataAccessObject
Parameters:
termQuery - String to query for
exact - boolean to enforce exact matching to termQuery
Returns:
match Term object, or null

public java.util.Collection<edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.Term> getTerms(java.lang.String termQuery)
Same as getTerms(String, int) with default of 5 requested results.

Specified by:

Returns:

getTerms

public java.util.Collection<edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.Term> getTerms(java.lang.String termQuery,
                                                                                 int amountRequested)
Find a list of Term objects corresponding to the termQuery, limited by amountRequested. Will never return a list larger than amountRequested, but may return a smaller list. Order of the list is the relevance ranking from MeSH search. Database cache is used to retrieve terms whenever possible; when the database does NOT contain the required information, the MeSH web service is queried instead.

Specified by:
getTerms in interface edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.resource_dao.ResourceDataAccessObject
Parameters:
termQuery - String to query for
amountRequested - Maximum number of results to attempt to find
Returns:
ArrayList of Terms, size is never greater than amountRequested

getSynonyms

public java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getSynonyms(java.lang.String termQuery)
Convenience method for returning the synonyms of the result of an exact match search for termQuery.

Specified by:
getSynonyms in interface edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.resource_dao.ResourceDataAccessObject
Parameters:
termQuery - String to query for
Returns:
Collection of String synonyms
